Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: My teacher didn't provide detailed feedback and it was quite generic compared to the feedback that GenAI provided me. This impacted my learning as with feedback I was able to tailor my responses to improve, but due to it being from GenAI I was unsure how trustworthy it would be as my teacher is the one who marks my results in the end.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Yes. Not getting specific and detailed feedback from my teacher leaves me feeling disappointed and lost.
